snippet: The police are looking for suspects and a motive for fires at predominantly black churches in the St. Louis area.
abstract: Police search for suspects and motive behind damage of six predominantly African-Americans churches in St Louis, Missouri area where the doors of each church were set on fire; possibility of racially or religiously motivated hate crime has not been ruled out.
lead_paragraph: The police are looking for suspects and a motive for fires at predominantly black churches in the St. Louis area.

headline.print_headline: Missouri: Fires Investigated at St. Louis Churches
headline.main: Missouri: Fires Investigated at St. Louis Churches
